channel.title: Making objects you can train on?
channel.description: I was wondering if someone could give me a tut on how to make like crates, prayer alters, dummies, ect. in a different city and how would I get it to give experience when players click it? Please help! Thanks.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 25, 2007, 07:53:07 PM[/size][hr]Whosoever helps me becomes an Admin on my server!(?)

item.source: Making objects you can train on?

item.title: Making objects you can train on?
item.dc:creator: @pmgz pmgz
item.description:
@pmgz wrote:

Well if you have a pimpscape source it should come with it put heres a simple and easy one

case [number of object without brackets]: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("[message here]"); actionTimer = 80; addSkillXP((1800*playerLevel[1]), 1); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(animation#); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;

Read full topic
